summary: The Working Waterfronts Act of 2025 focuses on supporting rural coastal and maritime economic development. It addresses several areas: supporting hydroelectric facilities and transitioning to alternative fuel fishing vessels; providing loans and grants for fisheries and mariculture; promoting shoreside infrastructure improvements, including grants for processing and cold storage. It also includes workforce development programs and provisions related to ocean innovation, vegetated coastal ecosystems, ocean acidification, and aquatic invasive species.
